combined-reference.title: Combined reference sequence
combined-reference.description: Reference file containing all AAV plasmid and host genome sequences.

combined-reference-index.title: Combined reference sequence index
combined-reference-index.description: Index file for combined reference FASTA.

compressed-combined-reference-index.title: Compressed combined reference sequence index
compressed-combined-reference-index.description: Extra index file for combined reference FASTA (required because combined reference is bgzip-compressed).

transgene_plasmid_consensus.title: Transgene plasmid consensus
transgene_plasmid_consensus.description: The transgene plasmid consensus sequence generated by medaka.

transgene_plasmid_variants.title: Transgene plasmid variants
transgene_plasmid_variants.description: The transgene plasmid variants file generated by medaka.

bam_all.title: Alignment file
bam_all.description: The resulting tagged BAM file from mapping reads to the combined reference.

bam_all_index.title: Alignment index file
bam_all_index.description: The index for the resulting tagged BAM file from mapping reads to the combined reference.

bam_backbone_contamination.title: backbone_contamination alignment
bam_backbone_contamination.description: The resulting tagged BAM file from mapping reads to the combined reference. This file contains alignmnets with the genotype assignment: backbone_contamination

bam_index_backbone_contamination.title: backbone_contamination alignment index
bam_index_backbone_contamination.description: The resulting tagged BAM index file from mapping reads to the combined reference. This indexes the file containing alignments with the genotype assignment: backbone_contamination

bam_full_ssaav.title: full_ssaav alignment
bam_full_ssaav.description: The resulting tagged BAM file from mapping reads to the combined reference. This file contains alignmnets with the genotype assignment: full_ssaav

bam_index_full_ssaav.title: full_ssaav alignment index
bam_index_full_ssaav.description: The resulting tagged BAM index file from mapping reads to the combined reference. This indexes the file containing alignments with the genotype assignment: full_ssaav

bam_index_partial_ssaav.title: partial_ssaav alignment index
bam_index_partial_ssaav.description: The resulting tagged BAM index file from mapping reads to the combined reference. This indexes the file containing alignments with the genotype assignment: partial_ssaav

bam_index_full_scaav.title: full_scaav alignment index
bam_index_full_scaav.description: The resulting tagged BAM index file from mapping reads to the combined reference. This indexes the file containing alignments with the genotype assignment: full_scaav

bam_index_itr_region_only.description: The resulting tagged BAM index file from mapping reads to the combined reference. This indexes the file containing alignments with the genotype assignment: itr_region_only

bam_index_complex.title: complex alignment index

igv-config.title: IGV config JSON file
igv-config.description: JSON file with IGV config options to be used by the EPI2ME Desktop Application.
